data.title: Rothman Tony
data.meta_description: Science a LA Mode: Physical Fashions and Fictions by Rothman, Tony and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
a few black and white text-figures 1st edition, 1989 Book condition, Etat : Bon hardcover, editor's binding, under editor's white printed dust-jacket, illustrated by pi symbol under an ice ball grand In-8 1 vol. - 219 pages Contents, Chapitres : Contents, Preface, xii, Text, Notes, Index, 207 pages - The garden of cosmological delights - Metaflation ? - Geodesics, domes, and spacetime - The evolution of entropy - A memoir of nuclear winter - Genius and biographers : The Fictionalization of Evariste Galois near fine copy, the dust-jacket is fine, inside is near fine, small agency stamp and a small pink mark on the superior right corner on the endpapers, unmarked and clean, complete of the errata folio 480.

Condition: Very Good. illustrated edition. Former library book; may include library markings. Used book that is in excellent condition. May show signs of wear or have minor defects.

paperback. Condition: As New. 1. LIKE NEW!!! Has a red or black remainder mark on bottom/exterior edge of pages.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. A decent,clean copy,with a little scuffing to the unclipped dustwrapper.No inscriptions.Stories with a Russian background.

Condition: New. Idioma/Language: Español. Tony Rothman, profesor de física en Harvard y Princeton, nos guía paso a paso entre grandes temas que ocupan a los cosmólogos contemporáneos, desde la materia oscura a la gravedad cuántica. Con analogías y sentido del humor, detalla las técnicas pioneras -tan elementales como absolutamente complejas- que los científicos están aplicando para desentrañar los enigmas del universo. Según Rothman, la cosmología moderna es una intricada red de predicciones teoréticas confirmadas por observaciones extremadamente precisas que hacen de la teoría del Big Bang uno de los edificios más sólidos que se han levantado en la historia de la ciencia. Y, al mismo tiempo, se cura de distinguir la física establecida de la especulación, destacando las controversias existentes e iluminando las vías futuras de exploración. *** Nota: Los envíos a España peninsular, Baleares y Canarias se realizan a través de mensajería urgente. No aceptamos pedidos con destino a Ceuta y Melilla.

Disbound. Condition: Very Good. First Edition. 8 pages, illustrated. Note; this is an original article separated from the volume, not a reprint or copy. Size: A4 Size.
